text:
[Verse]
Running through the night
Under stars so bright
Feel the world ignite
On this endless flight

[Verse 2]
Every heart beats fast
Future's coming fast
Moments meant to last
We forget the past

[Chorus]
Chasing dreams we fly
Touch that open sky
Never asking why
Just you and I

[Verse 3]
Climbing every wall
Answering the call
Even if we fall
We will stand tall

[Bridge]
Lights are in our eyes
Cutting through the lies
Making new allies
In the night's disguise

[Chorus]
Chasing dreams we fly
Touch that open sky
Never asking why
Just you and I
title: Chasing Dreams
